description.message: Adds a toolbar button to generate secure passwords.

passwordHeader.message: The following new password has been copied to the clipboard:

passwordWarning.message: After setting your password for a website, sign out and sign back in to make sure that Firefox saved the password. If it is not saved anywhere else, then this password will be gone for good when you close this page, refresh this page, or generate a new password on this page.

rememberPasswords.message: Firefox does not currently ask to remember passwords. Click here to fix that.
